project.name: Command Line Archetype
project.description:
Allows you to define a project that produces the binary for a command-line based application, using the Assembly plug-in.
Use this command to generate your project from this archetype (doesn't require any pre-download):
mvn archetype:generate \ -DgroupId=org.test.group \ -DartifactId=test-cli \ -DarchetypeGroupId=uk.ac.ebi.maven \ -DarchetypeArtifactId=cli-archetype \ -DarchetypeVersion=1.0-SNAPSHOT \ -DarchetypeRepository=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/EBIBioSamples/EBIBioSamples.github.io/maven-repo
